org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test

类 IntegrationTestReplication.VerifyReplicationLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test.IntegrationTestReplication.VerifyReplicationLoop
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    封闭类:
    IntegrationTestReplication

    protected class IntegrationTestReplication.VerifyReplicationLoop
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    The main runner loop for the test. It uses IntegrationTestBigLinkedList for the generation and verification of the linked list. It is heavily based on IntegrationTestBigLinkedList.Loop

    • 字段概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int run(String[] args)
      The main test runner This test has 4 steps: 1: setupTablesAndReplication 2: generate the data into the source cluster 3: wait for replication to propagate 4: verify that the data is available in the sink cluster

      Run the IntegrationTestBigLinkedList.Generator in the source cluster.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setupTablesAndReplication

        protected void setupTablesAndReplication()
                                  throws Exception
        This tears down any tables that existed from before and rebuilds the tables and schemas on the source cluster. It then sets up replication from the source to the sink cluster by using the ReplicationAdmin connection.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • waitForReplication

        protected void waitForReplication()
                           throws Exception
        抛出:
        Exception

      • runGenerator

        protected void runGenerator()
                     throws Exception
        Run the IntegrationTestBigLinkedList.Generator in the source cluster. This assumes that the tables have been setup via setupTablesAndReplication.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • runVerify

        protected void runVerify(long expectedNumNodes)
                  throws Exception
        Run the IntegrationTestBigLinkedList.Verify in the sink cluster. If replication is working properly the data written at the source cluster should be available in the sink cluster after a reasonable gap
        参数:
        expectedNumNodes - the number of nodes we are expecting to see in the sink cluster
        抛出:
        Exception

      • run

        public int run(String[] args)
        throws Exception
        The main test runner This test has 4 steps: 1: setupTablesAndReplication 2: generate the data into the source cluster 3: wait for replication to propagate 4: verify that the data is available in the sink cluster
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
        参数:
        args - should be empty
        返回:
        0 on success
        抛出:
        Exception - on an error
